Bookdown Test Uging jtr13 Template Chapter 1 Preface 1.1 Git Setup

Bookdown Test Uging jtr13 Template DS-SL 2022-10-15 Chapter 1 Preface 1.1 Git Setup On remote GitHub from Code, copy the url to clone. https://github.com/ds-sl/jtr13temp.git Open RStudio and create a New Project with version control by Git and use the address above. Use the terminal to renew the git by the following git init directory name and confirm the location of .git cd directory name git remote rm origin git remote add origin git@github-sub:ds-sl/jtr13temp.git. Note that here we use the alias of ssh we set in git.config git push -u origin master Go back to RStudio and check GIT on top Project Setup. Use Git on top right. (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:bookdown hsuzuki$ git init jtr13temp Reinitialized existing Git repository in /Users/hsuzuki/Documents/computer/r/bookdown/jtr13temp/.git/ (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:bookdown hsuzuki$ cd jtr13temp/ (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:jtr13temp hsuzuki$ git remote add origin git@github-sub:ds-sl/jtr13temp.git fatal: remote origin already exists. (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:jtr13temp hsuzuki$ git remote rm origin (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:jtr13temp hsuzuki$ git remote add origin git@github-sub:ds-sl/jtr13temp.git (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:jtr13temp hsuzuki$ git push -u origin main error: src refspec main does not match any. error: failed to push some refs to 'git@github-sub:ds-sl/jtr13temp.git' (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:jtr13temp hsuzuki$ git push -u origin master Branch 'master' set up to track remote branch 'master' from 'origin'. Everything up-to-date (base) hsuzuki-imacpro-3132:jtr13temp hsuzuki$
